message_1: What is the largest known Mersenne prime as of January 2021? (Hint: It has over 24 million digits and can be found on the Great Internet Mersenne Prime Search website.)
message_2: As of January 2021, the largest known Mersenne prime is 2^82,589,933 âˆ’ 1. It has 24,862,048 digits and was discovered on December 7, 2018, as part of the Great Internet Mersenne Prime Search (GIMPS) project.
